<div id="whats_new" class="registered_link"></div>

The following features are added to create EDB JDBC Connector `42.2.19.1`:

- Merged with the upstream community driver version `42.2.19`. 

- EDB JDBC Connector now supports GSSAPI encrypted connection.

- Deprecated support for Java 1.6 and 1.7 versions. Previous version of EDB JDBC Connector v42.2.12.3 will continue to support Java 1.6 and 1.7 versions.
